Package arcade.potts.sim.hamiltonian

Class SubstrateHamiltonian

  • java.lang.Object
    • arcade.potts.sim.hamiltonian.SubstrateHamiltonian
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Hamiltonian
    public class SubstrateHamiltonian
extends java.lang.Object
implements Hamiltonian
    Implementation of Hamiltonian for substrate energy.

      • getDelta

        public double getDelta​(int sourceID,
                       int targetID,
                       int x,
                       int y,
                       int z)
        Gets change in energy.

        Substrate energy is calculated by summing across substrate voxels below the given voxel. Change in adhesion energy is taken as the difference in substrate energies for the source and target IDs.

        Specified by:
        getDelta in interface Hamiltonian
        Parameters:
        sourceID - the id of the source voxel
        targetID - the id of the target voxel
        x - the x coordinate
        y - the y coordinate
        z - the z coordinate
        Returns:
        the change in energy

      • getDelta

        public double getDelta​(int id,
                       int sourceRegion,
                       int targetRegion,
                       int x,
                       int y,
                       int z)
        Gets change in energy for region.

        Substrate energy is set to zero. Region voxels cannot adhere to substrate.

        Specified by:
        getDelta in interface Hamiltonian
        Parameters:
        id - the voxel id
        sourceRegion - the region of the source voxel
        targetRegion - the region of the source voxel
        x - the x coordinate
        y - the y coordinate
        z - the z coordinate
        Returns:
        the change in energy

      • getSubstrate

        double getSubstrate​(int id,
                    int x,
                    int y,
                    int z)
        Gets substrate energy for a given voxel.

        Substrate is assumed to be located at z = 0. Media (id = 0) returns zero for substrate energy. Substrate energy is scaled by distance from z = 0 by a power function.

        Parameters:
        id - the voxel id
        x - the x coordinate
        y - the y coordinate
        z - the z coordinate
        Returns:
        the energy

      • initialize

        void initialize​(PottsSeries series)
        Initializes parameters for substrate hamiltonian term.
        Parameters:
        series - the series instance

      • createSubstrate

        int[][] createSubstrate​(int length,
                        int width)
        Creates array representing substrate.
        Parameters:
        length - the length (x direction) of potts array
        width - the width (y direction) of potts array
        Returns:
        the substrate array
